items.sentence: I want to see you in your office in half an hour.
I want to thank all of you for coming here today.
I want to thank you for helping us get that done.
Tom\'s great-grandfather was the mayor of Boston.
Tom\'s hair has turned gray since I last saw him.
Tom\'s house is only three blocks away from here.
Tom\'s new girlfriend is much younger than he is.
Tom had his wallet stolen while he was in Boston.
Tom hardly spoke any French when I first met him.
Tom has a history of arrests for drunken driving.
